name: Koronis
description:
Koronis is an endless survival arcade-like game where you control a spaceship flying through the Koronis asteroid belt, avoiding asteroids and planets to survive.

It's made using Python and Pygame.  As this is my first game, it is vastly incomplete and empty, and I am only uploading it to have a reference of where I started.

Gameplay

The player controls a spaceship (yes, that is  a spaceship) that has to avoid asteroids and planets falling from the top of the screen, having only one bullet that reloads every couple of seconds to destroy them.


Warning

For some unknown reason, Windows Defender flags the game executable as a Trojan. As this is my first project and i don't expect anyone to download it, I'm gonna post it anyways. If you wish to play the game, I would recommend building it yourself from the source available on my GitHub.
